description.value: Hearing is the ability to observe sound, with the purpose of communicating with others, localizing the source of the sound and recognizing certain sounds. This pertains to observing the sound waves, and not processing the sounds in the brain. A hearing disorder can lead to things including communication problems.

purpose.value: A derived profile from [zib-HearingFunction.HearingAid.Product](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-HearingFunction.HearingAid.Product) to provide a version better suited for implementation purposes. This profile augments the base profile with elements found in the various use cases that have adopted the zib.
